content: Welcome to Ju Ren's Homepage Ju Ren,  Ph.D. Depart. of Computer Science and Techology Tsinghua University Address: FIT 3529, Shuangqing Road, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084 China Email: renju AT tsinghua.edu.cn NEWS Nov. 2025 - 3 paper were conditionally accepted by ACM MobiCom 2026 and one paper was accpeted by ACM KDD 2026. Congratulations to Yongjian, Shuning, Yizhe and Chenxi! Aug. 2025 - One paper was accepted by EuroSys 2026 and one paper was accpeted by EMNLP 2025. Congratulations to Zixu and Ziqing! July 2025 - Our paper, "Cross-Modal Federated Learning Among Unimodal Devices", was accepted by ACM IMWUT/Ubicomp. Congratulations to Yongheng！ July 2025 - Our paper, "Bridging Storage and Execution: A Semantic Virtual Bus for On-Demand Application Streaming", was accepted by USENIX NSDI 2026. Congratulations to Jun！ June 2025 - 2 papers were accepted by ACM MobiCom 2025. Congratulations to Jinrui and Hao！ May 2025 - 2 papers were accepted by IEEE/ACM IWQoS 2025. Congratulations to Guanbo and Ziyan！ Apr. 2025 - 2 papers were accepted by USENIX ATC 2025 and ACM ASPLOS 2025, respectively. Congratulations to Tuowei！ Apr. 2025 - 3 papers were accepted by ACM MobiSys 2025. Congratulations to Yongheng, Yizhe and Lili！ Feb. 2025 - Our paper, "AugFL: Augmenting Federated Learning with Pretrained Models", was accepted by ACM/IEEE Transactions on Networking. Congratulations to Sheng！ BRIEF BIOGRAPHY I am currently an associate professor with the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China. Prior to joining Tsinghua, I was a professor with the School of Computer Science and Engineering, Central South University, Changsha, China. My research interests include Internet-of-Things, edge computing, distributed & embedded AI, and operating system. I am a senior member of the IEEE and a member of the ACM. I was recognized as a highly cited researcher by Clarivate in 2020-2022. I am looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students who are intrested in my research areas. Please feel free to contact me, if you want to join my group.
